reviewText: I knew Rebecca by heart because I read it so many times and have seen so many versions.  Next to the Hitchcock version, this is my new favorite.  This is the only one where you can tell that Maxim really did love the second Mrs. DeWinters.  The plot is different from the book and the Hitchcock version, but that's the way it goes.
Awesome film for my Italian class... They loved it!
The movie is wonderful. Even though it diverges slightly from the original Rebecca, it is worth watching. I would advise buyers to make sure they are in the right Region before buying the movie.
